title: [Large-Scale] Short-Term Course for Strengthening Mathematical Leadership Competencies Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on game-based mathematical problem-solving activities feasible in BYOD environments, with sustained learning motivation through online/offline feedback.

learning_goals: Learners improve mathematical problem-solving efficiency by utilizing the goal-setting → challenge → feedback cycle in game-based tasks with over 85% consistency.
Learners can increase team members' learning engagement by over 30% through gamification elements (level-up, badges, leaderboards).
Learners will solve complex mathematical problems with 90% accuracy through 1:1 mentoring and small-group collaborative learning, culminating in a final project presentation at the end of the course

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) support guide

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
